attributes.action: Hold a referendum on government leadership due to COVID laws being broken.
attributes.additional_details: We want a referendum held on the current government leadership as it has now been proven that the Prime Minister and the Chancellor of the Exchequer broke the law in relation to COVID restrictions. Thousands of people died alone due to the laws that they proposed, but did not follow themselves.
attributes.background: We would like the UK government and parlement to support a nationwide referendum as a vote of no confidence in the Prime minister (Boris Johnson) and the Chancellor of the Exchequer (Rishi Sunak). If it is found that the majority has lost confidence in leadership they should resign immediately.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609107
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603106
